author: Cleo Abram
description:
If you chop off this animal's head, it just… grows another one. If you chop it in half, or into 20 pieces, it just forms into new animals. If you TOSS IT IN A BLENDER, blend it up, then put it in a centrifuge, it still just COMES RIGHT BACK.

And it could teach us how to help you live longer too!

This tiny, carnivorous animal has mystified scientists for hundreds of years because of its incredible ability to regenerate. About every 20 days it completely renews all 100,000 cells that make up its body.

To learn more, subscribe!

#shorts #hydra #immortal #biology #science #longevity
title: This Animal Can Live Forever
